URL: https://sladecopyhouse.com/health-and-wellness-copywriting/
Text: [NOW BOOKING JANUARY 2026 & BEYOND!](https://sladecopyhouse.com/words-matter-crewneck)

# 7 Health and Wellness Copywriting Secrets That Sell

## [Copywriting](https://sladecopyhouse.com/category/copywriting/), [SEO](https://sladecopyhouse.com/category/seo/)

The global wellness industry is projected to grow at a whopping 8.6% average annual growth, reaching $8.5 trillion in 2027.

This means that to grow your brand, health and wellness copywriting should _take absolute priority on your agenda._ Itâ€™s how youâ€™re going to color outside the lines and make your brand voice HEARD!

Yet, in health and wellness, writing great copy is easier said than done.

From crafting catchy website headlines to search engine optimization (SEO), so many bits and pieces go into crafting a persuasive message that engages your audience and inspires them to take action toward a healthier lifestyle.

If trying to find the right words makes your brain hurt, donâ€™t worry!
